EmailTemplate.name: FW: Payments to MBO - Urgent! - Resolved. (1343251194.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: FW: Payments to MBO - Urgent! - Resolved. (1343251194.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Max, Just an FYI you will still need to enter your hours in our system as well no matter what Irena wants because I need to create an invoice internally so we have something to apply the funds to when they come in. Basically, I am asking her if she wants to be copied on that invoice or not. So to clarify, either way, we still need to create an invoice in our system, meaning you will still need to enter your hours in our time keeping system. Thanks,Sara From: Sara Conde Sent: Wednesday, July 25, 2012 5:11 PM To: 'Irena Mozetich' Cc: 1 - Matt Alling; Max Katz (max.katz.work@gmail.com) Subject: RE: Payments to MBO - Urgent! - Resolved. Hi Irena, If that is what you prefer, that is fine with us. Would you still like us to send you invoices as well for your records? Thanks,Sara From: Irena Mozetich [mailto:finance@calvingroups.com] <mailto:[mailto:finance@calvingroups.com]> Sent: Wednesday, July 25, 2012 5:08 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: 1 - Matt Alling Subject: Re: Payments to MBO - Urgent! - Resolved. Hi Sara,
I need to receive the invoices directly from Max. I will then get the invoices approved and send you a check. Thank you.
Best Regards,
IrenaOn Tue, Jul 24, 2012 at 11:48 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Irena, I was able to talk to Max and get things worked out. Payment $4,625 is for June 18th –July 8th for a total of 92.5 hours. Payment $1,125 is for July 9th -15th for a total of 22.5 hours. I will be sending you revised invoices that reflect the $50 per hour rate. The last invoice you will receive from Max will be for time through July 20th (MBO will also invoice this for your records.) From July 20th and on all invoices will come directly from MBO only. Thank you!Sara From: Sara Conde Sent: Tuesday, July 24, 2012 1:49 PM To: finance@calvingroups.com <mailto:finance@calvingroups.com>; Dakota Younger (dakota@calvingroups.com <mailto:dakota@calvingroups.com>) Cc: Max Katz (max.katz.work@gmail.com <mailto:max.katz.work@gmail.com>) Subject: Payments to MBO - Urgent! Importance: High Hi Irena, We received two payments today from Calvin today, thank you! I wanted to follow up on the remittance so I can get corrected invoices out to you at the proper rate and time line for your accounting records and so that we can apply the funds properly in our system as well. Can you please provide me with remittance information for these payments? · $4,625 · $1,125 As, I understand it the rate is $50 per hour, please confirm. As soon as I have confirmation I will send you corrected invoices and apply funds in our system. Moving forward, MBO invoices will replace the ones Max has been sending you to cut down on confusion and streamline the process. Thank you,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
-- Best Regards,- - - Irena Mozetich | Finance Officer | Calvin Group w : 310.287.2400 <tel:310.287.2400> x304 f : 310.287.1226 <tel:310.287.1226> http://www.calvingroups.com/ <http://www.calvingroups.com/>.*NOTICE: this electronic mail (including any attachments) may contain information that is privileged, confidential, and/or otherwise protected from disclosure to anyone other than its intended recipient(s). Any dissemination or use of this electronic mail or its contents (including any attachments) by persons other than the intended recipient(s) is strictly prohibited. If you have received this message in error, please notify us immediately by reply e-mail so that we may correct our internal records.
